sqls.sql: SELECT "仕入NO" AS no, "仕入名称" AS name, "仕入区分" AS type, "数量" AS number, "金額" AS money, "ステータス" AS state, to_char("登録日",'YYYY/MM/DD') AS logindate, to_char("発送日①",'YYYY/MM/DD') AS senddate1, to_char("発送日②",'YYYY/MM/DD') AS senddate2, to_char("完了日",'YYYY/MM/DD') AS completiondate, "発送方式" AS sendway, "商品費用" AS productamountrmb, "商品費用（円）" AS productamountry, "物流費用" AS shipamountrmb, "物流費用（円）" AS shipamountry, "税金" AS faxamountrmb, "税金（円）" AS faxamountry, "為替レート" AS rate, "合計" AS totalrmb, "合計（円）" AS totalry, "追跡番号" AS tracknumber FROM "TRN_仕入管理" WHERE "店舗ID" = :shopid ORDER BY "仕入NO" desc
delete from "TRN_仕入管理" where "仕入NO" = !purchaseno and "店舗ID"= !shopid

INSERT into "TRN_仕入管理" ( "仕入NO", "仕入名称", "仕入区分",
"ステータス", "登録日", "発送日①", "発送日②",
"完了日", "発送方式", "為替レート",
"商品費用", "商品費用（円）", "物流費用", "物流費用（円）", "税金", "税金（円）", "合計", "合計（円）",
"店舗ID", "登録日時", "更新日時", "追跡番号" ) VALUES( !purchaseno, --仕入NO !purchase, --仕入名称 'A:普通仕入', --仕入区分
'1.新 規', --ステータス now(), --登録日 to_timestamp(!forwarddate1,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss'), --発送日① to_timestamp(!forwarddate2,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss'), --発送日②
to_timestamp(!completiondate,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss'), --完了日 !ship, --発送方式 cast(!rate as numeric), --為替レート
cast(!productamountRMB as numeric), --商品費用 cast(!productamountRY as numeric), --商品費用（円） cast(!shipamountRMB as numeric), --物流費用 cast(!shipamountRY as numeric), --物流費用（円） cast(!faxamountRMB as numeric), --税金 cast(!faxamountRY as numeric), --税金（円） cast(!totalRMB as numeric), --合計 cast(!totalRY as numeric), --合計（円）
!shopid, --店舗ID now(), --登録日時 now(), --更新日時 !track --追跡番号 )
DELETE FROM "TRN_仕入管理" WHERE "店舗ID" = !shopid and "仕入NO" = !purchaseno

insert into "TRN_仕入明細" select !purchaseno, MST."SKU番号", MST."ASIN番号",
MST."商品管理番号", MST."親子区分", MST."商品種別", MST."分類１", MST."分類２",
MST."仕入価格", !num, MST."仕入価格" * !num as "金額", MST."暫定フラグ",
MST."店舗ID", now(), now() from "MST_出品マスタ情報" MST where MST."SKU番号" = !sku and MST."ASIN番号" = !asin and MST."暫定フラグ" = '0' and MST."店舗ID" = !shopid

insert into "TRN_仕入明細" select !purchaseno, MST."SKU番号", MST."ASIN番号",
MST."商品管理番号", MST."親子区分", MST."商品種別", MST."分類１", MST."分類２",
MST."仕入価格", !num, MST."仕入価格" * !num as "金額", MST."暫定フラグ",
MST."店舗ID", now(), now() from "MST_出品マスタ情報" MST where MST."商品管理番号" = !pno and MST."分類１" = !sub1 and MST."分類２" = !sub2 and MST."暫定フラグ" = '1' and MST."店舗ID" = !shopid
DELETE FROM "TRN_仕入明細" WHERE "店舗ID" = !shopid and "仕入NO" = !purchaseno

SELECT "仕入価格" as price, "商品管理番号" AS productno, "商品種別" AS type, "分類１" AS sub1, "分類２" AS sub2 FROM "MST_出品マスタ情報" WHERE "店舗ID" = !shopid AND ( "ASIN番号" = !asin )
AND ( "ASIN番号" is null )
AND ( "SKU番号" = !sku )

SELECT "仕入価格" as price FROM "MST_出品マスタ情報" WHERE "店舗ID" = !shopid AND ( "商品管理番号" = !no )
AND ( "商品種別" = !type )
AND ( "分類１" = !sub1 )
AND ( "分類２" = !sub2 )

UPDATE "TRN_仕入管理" MST SET "数量" = TEMP."数量合計" , "金額" = TEMP."金額合計" FROM ( SELECT "店舗ID", "仕入NO", sum("数量") as "数量合計", sum("金額") as "金額合計" FROM "TRN_仕入明細" GROUP BY "店舗ID", "仕入NO" ) TEMP WHERE MST."仕入NO" = TEMP."仕入NO" and MST."店舗ID" = TEMP."店舗ID" and MST."仕入NO" = !purchaseno and MST."店舗ID" = !shopid
insert into "TRN_仕入資料" ( "仕入NO", "枝番", "ファイル名称", "資料名称", "拡張子", "店舗ID", "登録日時", "更新日時" ) values ( !purchaseno, !subno, !filename, !dataname, !suffix, !shopid, now(), now() )
SELECT "max"("枝番") as maxno FROM "TRN_仕入資料" WHERE "店舗ID" = !shopid AND ( "仕入NO" = !purchaseno )

SELECT "資料名称" as dataname, "ファイル名称" as filename, "拡張子" as suffix FROM "TRN_仕入資料" WHERE "店舗ID" = !shopid AND ( "仕入NO" = !purchaseno )
AND ( "仕入NO" is null )

delete from "TRN_仕入資料" where "店舗ID"= !shopid AND ( "仕入NO" = !purchaseno )
AND ( "仕入NO" is null )
AND ( "ファイル名称" = !filename )
AND ( "ファイル名称" is null )

SELECT "ファイル名称" as files, "拡張子" as suffix FROM "TRN_仕入資料" WHERE "店舗ID" = !shopid AND ( "仕入NO" = !purchaseno )
AND ( "仕入NO" is null )
AND ( "資料名称" = !dataname )
AND ( "資料名称" is null )
SELECT "仕入名称" as purchasename FROM "TRN_仕入管理" WHERE "店舗ID" = !shopid and "仕入NO" = !purchaseno
SELECT "ステータス" as status FROM "TRN_仕入管理" WHERE "店舗ID" = !shopid and "仕入NO" = !purchaseno

SELECT A."商品管理番号" AS productno, A."分類１" AS sub1, A."分類２" AS sub2, A."ASIN番号" AS asin, A."SKU番号" AS sku, A."LABEL番号" AS label, B."FBA在庫" AS fba, B."LOCAL在庫" AS LOCAL, C."数量" AS NUMBER FROM "TRN_仕入明細" C LEFT JOIN "MST_出品マスタ情報" A ON A."ASIN番号" = C."ASIN番号" AND A."SKU番号" = C."SKU番号" LEFT JOIN "MST_在庫情報" B ON C."ASIN番号" = B."ASIN番号" AND C."SKU番号" = B."SKU番号" LEFT JOIN "MST_ソート情報" S1 on C."商品種別" = S1."商品種別" and S1."分類" = '分類１' and C."分類１" = S1."内容" and C."店舗ID" = S1."店舗ID" LEFT JOIN "MST_ソート情報" S2 on C."商品種別" = S2."商品種別" and S2."分類" = '分類２' and C."分類２" = S2."内容" and C."店舗ID" = S2."店舗ID"
WHERE C."店舗ID" = !shopid and C."仕入NO" = !purchaseno ORDER BY A."商品管理番号", A."親子区分" desc, COALESCE(cast(S1."ソート" as varchar), A."分類１"), COALESCE(cast(S2."ソート" as varchar), A."分類２")

SELECT "仕入NO" AS purchaseno, "仕入名称" AS purchasename, "発送方式" AS sendway,
"登録日" AS logindate, "発送日①" AS senddate1, "発送日②" AS senddate2,
"完了日" AS completiondate, "商品費用" AS productamountrmb, "商品費用（円）" AS productamountry,
"物流費用" AS shipamountrmb, "物流費用（円）" AS shipamountry, "税金" AS faxamountrmb,
"税金（円）" AS faxamountry, "合計" AS totalrmb, "合計（円）" AS totalry,
"為替レート" AS rate, "追跡番号" AS tracknumber FROM "TRN_仕入管理" WHERE "店舗ID" = :shopid and "仕入NO" = :purchaseno
UPDATE "TRN_仕入管理" SET "ステータス" = '2.発送済' WHERE "店舗ID" = !shopid and "仕入NO" = !purchaseno
UPDATE "TRN_仕入管理" SET "ステータス" = '3.仕入済' WHERE "店舗ID" = !shopid and "仕入NO" = !purchaseno

UPDATE "TRN_仕入管理" SET
"仕入名称"= !purchase,
"発送日①"= to_timestamp(!forwarddate1,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss'), "発送日②"= to_timestamp(!forwarddate2,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss'),
"完了日"= to_timestamp(!completiondate,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss'), "発送方式"= !ship, "為替レート"= cast(!rate as numeric),
"商品費用"= cast(!productamountRMB as numeric), "商品費用（円）"= cast(!productamountRY as numeric), "物流費用"= cast(!shipamountRMB as numeric), "物流費用（円）"= cast(!shipamountRY as numeric), "税金"= cast(!faxamountRMB as numeric), "税金（円）"= cast(!faxamountRY as numeric), "合計"= cast(!totalRMB as numeric), "合計（円）"= cast(!totalRY as numeric),
"更新日時"= now(), "追跡番号"= !track WHERE "店舗ID" = !shopid and "仕入NO" = !purchaseno

UPDATE "MST_在庫情報" MST SET "途中在庫_仕入" = COALESCE("途中在庫_仕入",0) + COALESCE(TRN."数量",0) FROM "TRN_仕入明細" TRN WHERE MST."ASIN番号" = TRN."ASIN番号" and MST."SKU番号" = TRN."SKU番号" and TRN."仕入NO" = !purchaseno and TRN."店舗ID" = !shopid

UPDATE "MST_在庫情報" MST SET "途中在庫_仕入" = COALESCE("途中在庫_仕入",0) - COALESCE(TRN."数量",0) FROM "TRN_仕入明細" TRN WHERE MST."ASIN番号" = TRN."ASIN番号" and MST."SKU番号" = TRN."SKU番号" and TRN."仕入NO" = !purchaseno and TRN."店舗ID" = !shopid

UPDATE "MST_在庫情報" MST SET "LOCAL在庫" = COALESCE("LOCAL在庫",0) - COALESCE(TRN."数量",0) FROM "TRN_仕入明細" TRN WHERE MST."ASIN番号" = TRN."ASIN番号" and MST."SKU番号" = TRN."SKU番号" and TRN."仕入NO" = !purchaseno and TRN."店舗ID" = !shopid

UPDATE "MST_在庫情報" MST SET "LOCAL在庫" = COALESCE("LOCAL在庫",0) + COALESCE(TRN."数量",0) FROM "TRN_仕入明細" TRN WHERE MST."ASIN番号" = TRN."ASIN番号" and MST."SKU番号" = TRN."SKU番号" and TRN."仕入NO" = !purchaseno and TRN."店舗ID" = !shopid

select m."商品種別" as type, m."商品管理番号" as pno, m."親子区分" as preproduct, m."分類１" as sub1, m."分類２" as sub2, m."ASIN番号" as asin, m."SKU番号" as sku, m."LABEL番号" as label, m."商品名称" as productname, e."価格" as price, case when m."親子区分" = '親商品' then null when d."FBA在庫" != 0 then 'FBA' when d."FBA在庫" is null and d."FBM在庫" is null then '-' when d."FBA在庫" is null and d."FBM在庫" is not null then 'FBM' when d."FBA在庫" = 0 and d."FBM在庫" is null then 'FBA' when d."FBA在庫" = 0 and d."FBM在庫" = 0 then '-' when d."FBA在庫" = 0 and d."FBM在庫" != 0 then 'FBM' end as shippingway, d."FBA在庫" as fba, d."FBM在庫" as fbm, d."途中在庫_入庫" as put, d."LOCAL在庫" as local, d."途中在庫_仕入" as purchase, case when m."親子区分" = '親商品' then null else COALESCE(d."FBA在庫", 0) + COALESCE(d."FBM在庫", 0) + COALESCE(d."途中在庫_入庫", 0) end as stockonsell, case when m."親子区分" = '親商品' then null else COALESCE(d."LOCAL在庫", 0) + COALESCE(d."途中在庫_仕入", 0) end as stockprepare, case when m."親子区分" = '親商品' then null else COALESCE(d."FBA在庫", 0) + COALESCE(d."FBM在庫", 0) + COALESCE(d."途中在庫_入庫", 0) + COALESCE(d."LOCAL在庫", 0) + COALESCE(d."途中在庫_仕入", 0) end as stockall, b."販売数量（直近３日間）" as selled3, b."販売数量（直近７日間）" as selled7, b."販売数量（直近３０日間）" as selled30, b."販売数量（直近６０日間）" as selled60, b."販売数量（直近９０日間）" as selled90, b."販売数量（直近１８０日間）" as selled180, b."販売数量（直近３６０日間）" as selled360, case when m."親子区分" = '親商品' then null else rpad(cast(round(b."販売数量（日平均値）", 5) as varchar), 5, '0') end as dayaverage,
m."店舗ID" as shopid, m."暫定フラグ" as zt_flg, a."数量" as purchasequantity from "MST_出品マスタ情報" m left join "TRN_仕入明細" a on m."ASIN番号" = a."ASIN番号" and m."SKU番号" = a."SKU番号" and m."店舗ID" = a."店舗ID" and a."仕入NO" = :no left join "MST_販売数量情報" b on m."ASIN番号" = b."ASIN番号" and m."SKU番号" = b."SKU番号" and m."店舗ID" = b."店舗ID" left join "MST_入庫仕入推奨数量情報" c on m."ASIN番号" = c."ASIN番号" and m."SKU番号" = c."SKU番号" and m."店舗ID" = c."店舗ID" left join "MST_在庫情報" d on m."ASIN番号" = d."ASIN番号" and m."SKU番号" = d."SKU番号" and m."暫定フラグ" = d."暫定フラグ" and m."店舗ID" = d."店舗ID" left join "IPT_全出品情報" e on m."ASIN番号" = e."ASIN 1" and m."SKU番号" = e."出品者SKU" and m."店舗ID" = e."店舗ID" left join "MST_ソート情報" S1 on m."商品種別" = S1."商品種別" and S1."分類" = '分類１' and m."分類１" = S1."内容" and m."店舗ID" = S1."店舗ID" left join "MST_ソート情報" S2 on m."商品種別" = S2."商品種別" and S2."分類" = '分類２' and m."分類２" = S2."内容" and m."店舗ID" = S2."店舗ID" where m."暫定フラグ" = '0' and m."店舗ID" = :shopid and m."親子区分" = '子商品' order by m."商品種別", m."商品管理番号", COALESCE(cast(S1."ソート" as varchar), m."分類１"), COALESCE(cast(S2."ソート" as varchar), m."分類２")

select m."商品種別" as type, m."商品管理番号" as pno, m."親子区分" as preproduct, m."分類１" as sub1, m."分類２" as sub2, m."ASIN番号" as asin, m."SKU番号" as sku, m."LABEL番号" as label, m."商品名称" as productname, null as price, null as shippingway, d."FBA在庫" as fba, d."FBM在庫" as fbm, d."途中在庫_入庫" as put, d."LOCAL在庫" as local, d."途中在庫_仕入" as purchase, case when m."親子区分" = '親商品' then null else COALESCE(d."FBA在庫", 0) + COALESCE(d."FBM在庫", 0) + COALESCE(d."途中在庫_入庫", 0) end as stockonsell, case when m."親子区分" = '親商品' then null else COALESCE(d."LOCAL在庫", 0) + COALESCE(d."途中在庫_仕入", 0) end as stockprepare, case when m."親子区分" = '親商品' then null else COALESCE(d."FBA在庫", 0) + COALESCE(d."FBM在庫", 0) + COALESCE(d."途中在庫_入庫", 0) + COALESCE(d."LOCAL在庫", 0) + COALESCE(d."途中在庫_仕入", 0) end as stockall, null as selled3, null as selled7, null as selled30, null as selled60, null as selled90, null as selled180, null as selled360, null as dayaverage,
m."店舗ID" as shopid, m."暫定フラグ" as zt_flg, a."数量" as purchasequantity from "MST_出品マスタ情報" m left join "TRN_仕入明細" a on m."商品管理番号" = a."商品管理番号" and m."親子区分" = a."親子区分" and m."商品種別" = a."商品種別" and m."分類１" = a."分類１" and m."分類２" = a."分類２" and m."暫定フラグ" = a."暫定フラグ" and m."店舗ID" = a."店舗ID" and a."仕入NO" = :no left join "MST_在庫情報" d on m."商品管理番号" = d."商品管理番号" and m."親子区分" = d."親子区分" and m."商品種別" = d."商品種別" and m."分類１" = d."分類１" and m."分類２" = d."分類２" and m."暫定フラグ" = d."暫定フラグ" and m."店舗ID" = d."店舗ID" left join "MST_ソート情報" S1 on m."商品種別" = S1."商品種別" and S1."分類" = '分類１' and m."分類１" = S1."内容" and m."店舗ID" = S1."店舗ID" left join "MST_ソート情報" S2 on m."商品種別" = S2."商品種別" and S2."分類" = '分類２' and m."分類２" = S2."内容" and m."店舗ID" = S2."店舗ID" where m."暫定フラグ" = '1' and m."店舗ID" = :shopid and m."親子区分" = '子商品' order by m."商品種別", m."商品管理番号", COALESCE(cast(S1."ソート" as varchar), m."分類１"), COALESCE(cast(S2."ソート" as varchar), m."分類２")
SELECT "資料名称" as filename, "拡張子" AS suffix FROM "TRN_仕入資料" WHERE "店舗ID" = !shopid and "仕入NO" = !purchaseno

SELECT "ファイル名称" as files
FROM "TRN_仕入資料" WHERE "店舗ID" = !shopid and "仕入NO" = !purchaseno and "資料名称" = !filename and "拡張子" = !suffix
